properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated Tuesday, July 4, [1933]; written on flight between Foochow [Fuzhou] and Swatow [Shantou]; survey flight from Shanghai to Canton [Guangzhou]; includes description of Fuzhou and accommodations there; dinner with Tommy Reynolds, former Vice Consul in Nanking [Nanjing], and Mr. Brant; actions in Amoy [Xiamen]; includes description of Shantou; mentions [William L.] Bond.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
